name: AJ Fernandez - Last Call - Maduro - Flaquitas
additionalNotes: Small-batch, boutique blend Last Call Maduro from popular cigar-maker AJ Fenandez presents a unique Pennsylvania Broadleaf wrapper over a hearty combination of all-Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. A medium to full-bodied profile of molasses and black pepper delivers hints of citrus and cedar with an earthy aroma. Classic, handcrafted shapes showcase a somewhat coarse, veiny wrapper leaf in a blend that offers a distinct richness and depth.
